name: Backpacker's Pantry Vanilla Ice Cream Sandwich
description: This vanilla ice cream bar sandwiched between two chocolate wafers is freeze-dried so it's melt-proof.Ice cream ingredients: milkfat, sugar, nonfat milk, corn syrup, whey, stabilized and emulsified by and diglycerides, guar gum, cellulose gum and carageenan, artificial flavour and vegetable annatto colour.Wafer ingredients: bleached wheat flour, sugar, caramel colour, corn sugar, vegetable shortening (partially hydrogenated oils, soybean, cotton seed), corn flour, corn syrup, cocoa, modified corn starch, salt, baking soda, mono and diglycerides, soy lecithin.Allergins: milk, gluten, wheat, and soy. May contain traces of peanuts and other nuts.
